title: Convert string to reversecase
contentHtml:
Write a program to convert string to reversecase

Reversecase is a style of writing in which all lowercase letters are converted to uppercase and all uppercase letters are converted to lowercase.

Input  : "hello world"
Output : "HELLO WORLD"

function convertStringToReverseCase(str) {
   return str
      .split('')
      .map(char => char.match(/[a-z]/)  ? 
         char.toUpperCase() 
         : char.toLowerCase())
      .join('');
 }
markdown:
## Write a program to convert string to reversecase

Reversecase is a style of writing in which all lowercase letters are converted to uppercase and all uppercase letters are converted to lowercase.

```
Input  : "hello world"
Output : "HELLO WORLD"
```

---

<CodeBlock slug="convert-string-to-reversecase" >

```js
function convertStringToReverseCase(str) {
   return str
      .split('')
      .map(char => char.match(/[a-z]/)  ? 
         char.toUpperCase() 
         : char.toLowerCase())
      .join('');
 }
```

</CodeBlock>
